name: Homicide Detective
description:
Hi gamers, hope 2021 will be a great year for everyone!

Try out this new game that we just released for pc and let us know your feedback! Thank you all for your support in advance :) 

BETA v1.2

GAME DESCRIPTION: 
A 3D FIRST-PERSON Hidden Object RPG game!
Are you Detective enough? Find out now!

Put your detective investigation skills to the test with this Murder Mystery case: a realistic, immersive criminal investigator game with interactive gameplay like no others!

Become a detective and work with the police to solve the case in this exciting hidden object adventure game. Search for clues at the crime scene interrogates suspects, and analyze evidence to find the culprit. 

Do you have what it takes to be a real detective? 
Find out with us, catapult yourself into a 3D AND FREE TO BE EXPLORED world of mysteries and secrets. 
Find the secret passages that will lead you to the 5 bonus hints of the game, dive headlong into this unparalleled adventure!! 

With this addictive and funny game, you will have non-stop fun trying to find out what happened and frame the killer!

FEATURES: 

• Step into the shoes of a true homicide detective!
• Investigate the crime scene in a mansion surrounded by mysterious nature. 
• Find the secret passages that will lead you to the 5 bonus hints of the game.
• Examine the clues and analyze the crime scene.
• Interrogate witnesses and suspects.
 • Move objects to find secret passages.
• Enters the killer's mind. 
• Bring the killer to justice!
